p: Certain weed species add to the vegetation diversity and therefore they are considered a positive component in ecological terms, but they are frequently associated with negative effects upon domestic livestock production [ 26]. The similarity in species composition between mixture two and the control was certainly due to the unsown ”weedy” liverseed grass ( Urochloa panicoides Beauv.) and other unsown broadleaved weed species, such as Paddy’s Lucerne, purslane small-flowered mallow ( Malva parviflora L.) and thorn apple ( Datura ferox L.), which were equally abundant in both mixture two and the control.
